messages.content: What type of custom node did the author use for Face Detection in Comfy-RVC?
The author used the feature from the [face_alignment](https://github.com/1adrianb/face-alignment) repository for Face Detection in Comfy-RVC.
How did the author modify the code for Face Detection in Comfy-RVC?
The author modified the code for Face Detection to take batches of faces at a time.
Could you provide a link to the original repository for face_alignment?
The face_alignment repository can be found at [https://github.com/1adrianb/face-alignment](https://github.com/1adrianb/face-alignment).
Comfy-RVC is a tool or application that includes a feature for Face Detection, which has been implemented using code adapted from the face_alignment repository.
Why did the author use batches of faces in the Face Detection feature?
The usage of batches of faces improves the efficiency of the Face Detection feature by processing multiple faces simultaneously.
How did the Face Detection feature in Comfy-RVC come to be?
The Face Detection feature in Comfy-RVC was implemented by modifying the code from the face_alignment repository to handle batch inputs.
What is the relationship between Face Detection and Comfy-RVC?
Face Detection in the context of Comfy-RVC refers to an application or tool that uses the Face Detection feature for its functionality.
